column5: A palindrome reads  the same backwards as forward.  This video reads the exact opposite backwards as forward.  Not only does it read the opposite, the meaning is the exact opposite.  This is only a 1 minute, 44 second video and it is brilliant!  http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=42E2fAWM6rA
Very cool! wish I could write stuff like that....
Very very neat...that must've taken quite a while to plan out.
sounds ALOT alike the girl from the Globe and Mail commercial. But cool  G
Thanks for sharing. Very cool! As a side note, I noticed that the narrator added the spoken word "true" to the second line on the 'reverse'. Sorry, I'm ATD Pikeslayer
